subject: Re: ADC Funds Portfolio
body:
Dear Edward,

Thanks for your email to my proposal and this has given me the confidence
to proceed with you herein this venture. With your full corporation we
shall finalize this transaction within the next 14 days and I will come
over to your country for this month.

The procedure for the investment funds transfer is very simple but then it
will cost us some money to achieve and that is the reason why I'm looking
for a foreigner to help me achieve this transfer.

For a successful transfer of that huge amount, we shall need some funds
clearance documents and this is where exactly i need your cooperation for a
fruitful transaction and I assure you you will never regret that you did
participate.

Thanks for your understanding and i wait to hear from you.

Kenneth Ridings

subject: Re: Dear Friend,
body:
Dear Edward,

I hope this email finds you in a good position and as for me I am doing
okay.

Kindly let me know your readiness and position to finalize ADC investment
funds Portfolio for our mutual benefits.

Also let me know where you needed clarification for your understanding. I
wait for your response.
Regards,
Kenneth Ridings
